abstract: Returns the shared activity summary type.
overview:
## Return Value

The shared [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKActivitySummaryType] instance.

## Discussion

This method returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKActivitySummaryType] concrete subclass. Use this type to request permission to read [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKActivitySummary] objects from the HealthKit store.

# activitySummaryType()

**Type Method**

Returns the shared activity summary type.

## Declaration

```swift
class func activitySummaryType() -> HKActivitySummaryType
```

## Return Value

The shared [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKActivitySummaryType] instance.

## Discussion

This method returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKActivitySummaryType] concrete subclass. Use this type to request permission to read [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKActivitySummary] objects from the HealthKit store.
title: activitySummaryType()
